results.name: Smallest prime factor of 6*n-1 that is congruent to 5 modulo 6.
reference: G. Pólya and G. Szegő, Problems and Theorems in Analysis I (Springer 1924, reprinted 1972), Part Eight, Chap. 2, Section 2, Problem 96.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 20 2005
